docs.title: 👀 Oh hey, you found me!
docs.text:
Welcome to RaeScripted, my personal technical writing diary, a growing collection of my work, learning notes, and documentation samples.

You’re probably here because I shared the link directly (shamelessly 😌) or you're considering me for a project. Either way, I’m glad you’re here.

Feel free to explore, give feedback, or even throw a little praise my way. I’m always open to constructive criticism or collaboration ideas.

📬 Want to collaborate or chat? Contact me here.

Built with MkDocs and hosted on GitHub Pages.

docs.title: About Me
docs.text:
Hi, I’m Seriki Oreoluwa Mariam, but you can call me Rae, a tech enthusiast with a background in computer science and mathematics. I'm passionate about blockchain development, automation, and using technology to solve real-world problems.

I enjoy turning complex ideas into simple, helpful content that’s easy to understand — whether it's documentation, tutorials, or personal learning notes.

class Rae:
    def __init__(self):
        self.role = "Technical Writer"
        self.focus = ["clarity", "curiosity", "impact"]

    def write(self):
        return "Tech made simple. Always."

Technical writing connects ideas to people. I'm here to help make that connection meaningful.

docs.title: 📬 Contact Me
docs.text:
I'm always open to meaningful conversations, collaborations, or new opportunities in the world of tech, blockchain, and writing!

  • Email: oreoluwaseriki43@gmail.com
  • Twitter: @Venara
  • LinkedIn: Seriki Oreoluwa
  • GitHub: Raerikiwrites

Let’s connect!
